content: **jomo socks** there are lots of mojo socks on ravelry and this pattern is the perfect sock to get your knitting mojo back i also wanted to call these the mojo socks because of two very special people in my life my twin sister jo my best friend and partner in twinset & purl and my lovely mum whose name was mo but who is no longer with us therefore to make them a little bit different these are the jomo socks this pattern will work for any fingering weight yarn but looks especially lovely in self striping sock yarn **pattern information** **sizes ** 1 adult m 64 sts / 2 adult l 72 sts to fit approximately 8-inch 20 cm /9-inch 22 5 cm foot circumference **yarn ** the dotty wool co high twist sw merino sock 80% sw merino wool/20% nylon 100g/365m 399yds in the sunset colour way **needles ** 2 5 mm / us 1 5 or size needed to get gauge **gauge ** 8 sts & 12 rounds = 1 inch / 2 5 cm in stocking stitch **notions ** stitch markers and cable needle
